summary: The Rockefeller family is an American family known for their wealth and influence. They built their fortune in the oil business, starting with John D. Rockefeller and his brother William in the 1800s. The family owned Standard Oil, which later became big companies like ExxonMobil and Chevron. They also controlled Chase Manhattan Bank. The Rockefellers are from Germany and Scotland, with ancestors who moved to the United States a long time ago. By 1987, they were one of the most powerful families in American history.
title: Rockefeller family
